text: Probably the biggest thing about year-round grazing is being able to manage your grass. So you'll have grass for year-round grazing. That's the number one thing. We no longer look at our cows as our primary management. We're managing grass. And the cows are just a tool we use to manage grass now.

And the cows are just a tool we use to manage grass now.
